slice.configuration.category.display.too: Options for the visual aspect of the menu.
slice.configuration.category.size.toolti: Options for adjusting the size of UI elements
slice.configuration.radialMenuRadius.too: Radius of the radial menu in pixels aka. the distance from the center of the screen
slice.configuration.itemSize.tooltip: Size of each item slot in the radial menu.
slice.configuration.slotSize.tooltip: Size of the slot background texture.
slice.configuration.visibility.hideUnuse: When enabled, empty slots in the radial menu will be hidden
slice.configuration.visibility.hideSlotN: When enabled, remove the slot number from the radial menu
slice.configuration.visibility.hideSlotS: When enabled, no slot sprite will be displayed
slice.configuration.counterclockwiseRota: When enabled, the radial menu rotates counterclockwise instead of clockwise
slice.configuration.behaviour.toggleKeyb: When enabled, pressing the "Open menu" key will toggle the menu. (No need to keep holding the key)
